ha#ratyaqpAM ~MvA Eqtat pRuqShThaM ~Myat pu#ShkarapaqrNa(gm) rUqpENaiqvainaqdA ha#rati puShkarapaqrNEnaq saM Ba#ratiq yOniqrvA aqgnEH pu#ShkarapaqrNa(gm) sayO#nimEqvAgni(gm) saMBa#rati kRuShNAjiqnEnaq saMBa#rati yaqj~jO vai kRu#ShNAjiqnaM ~Myaqj~jEnaiqva yaqj~ja(gm) saMBa#ratiq yad grAqmyANA$M paSUqnAM carma#NA saqBaMrE$d grAqmyAn 
paqSU~jCuqcA&rpa#yEt kRuShNAjiqnEnaq saMBa#ratyAraqNyAnEqva paqSUn - [  ] 17
